tool.name: TransformationEvaluation
tool.description: Applies a transformation to a range of values
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir in && ln -s '$in' 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' && #if $out_FLAG: mkdir out && #end if
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -in 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' #if $out_FLAG: -out 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("trafoxml")}' #end if #if not($out_FLAG): | tee '$stdout' #end if
## Postprocessing #if $out_FLAG: && mv 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("trafoxml")}' '$out' #end if

param.name: in
param.label: Input file containing the transformation description

param.name: out_FLAG
param.label: Generate output out (Output file containing original and transformed values; if empty, output is written to the screen)

param.name: max
param.label: Maximum value to transform (if at or below 'min', select a suitable maximum based on the transformation description)

tool.help: Applies a transformation to a range of values
